CALL SCOPE_IDENTITY();

update PUBLIC.CHARACTERS
ID_CHARACTER = #{record.idCharacter,jdbcType=BIGINT},
MAIN_CHARACTER = #{record.mainCharacter,jdbcType=CHAR},
NAME = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
POSITION = #{record.position,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PERSONAL_DATA_TASK_STATUS = #{record.personalDataTaskStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},

SECONDARY_CHARACTER_DESCRIPTION_TASK_STATUS = #{record.secondaryCharacterDescriptionTaskStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PERSONAL_DATA_FREE_TEXT = #{record.personalDataFreeText,jdbcType=CLOB},
PHYSIONOMY_FREE_TEXT = #{record.physionomyFreeText,jdbcType=CLOB},
